remarks.format: ## Remarks 只發生事件時控制項屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 處理事件很實用，當您想要判斷視其狀態和它所包含的值而定的資料列的錯誤。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains. 當您處理事件，並指定錯誤文字中處理常式中，資料列標頭顯示錯誤圖像除非屬性設定為`false`。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the property is set to `false`. 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 事件也會發生值擷取屬性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用屬性來判斷狀態或資料列的值來變更或修改使用這項資訊屬性。You can use the property to determine the state or value of a row, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化事件值會覆寫的屬性。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的資料列設定多個資料列的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
